data_start_values.value: ratio of land consumption rate to population growth rate
proportion of settlement and transport areas to population

data_footnotes:
Für die Jahre vor 2011 wurde die Bevölkerung anhand des Zensus 2011 sowie der Wanderungs-, Geburten- und Sterbestatistiken zurückgerechnet.
• Aufgrund methodischer Änderungen sind die Ergebnisse ab 2016 nur eingeschränkt mit den Vorjahren vergleichbar.

en.indicator_name: Ratio of land consumption rate to population growth rate
en.target_name: By 2030, enhance inclusive and sustainable urbanization and capacity for participatory, integrated and sustainable human settlement planning and management in all countries
en.un_designated_tier: Tier II

en.source_url_text_1d: Soil area (actual use): types of use – GENESIS online 33111-0001
en.data_footnotes:
For the years before 2011, the population was calculated backwards using the 2011 census and migration, birth and death statistics.
• Due to methodological changes, the results from 2016 onwards are only partially comparable with previous years.
